data.title: IBM Statistics - IBM Facts, Stats, Trends & Data (2024)
data.text:
IBM acquired cloud consulting firm Bluewolf for approximately $200 million in 2016. [ 6 ]

Date: Mar 30, 2016

IBM acquired healthcare analytics company Truven Health Analytics in 2016. [ 7 ]

Date: Feb 18, 2016

IBM acquired marketing software company Unica in [ 19 ]

Date: Aug 14, 2010

IBM acquired data storage firm Storwize for $140 million in 2010. [ 20 ]

Date: Jun 13, 2010
